name: Multi-Vitamin Healthy Hair Shampoo
description: Transform coarse, brittle locks into sumptuous silk. Our deeply nourishing and reparative shampoo is fortified with beneficial multivitamins to revitalize and mend dry, damaged hair.

name: Yuzu and Pomelo Glossing Shampoo
description: Hydrating shampoo gently washes away excess oil while giving hair brilliant shine, bounce, and vibrancy. Fortifies for healthier, stronger hair.

name: Yuzu and Pomelo Glossing Shampoo
description: Hydrating shampoo gently washes away excess oil while giving hair brilliant shine, bounce, and vibrancy. Fortifies for healthier, stronger hair.

name: Kelp and Mint Volumizing Shampoo
description: Hydrating and invigorating shampoo gently purifies while adding bounce, body, and luster. Kelp thickens and strengthens while seaweed collagen adds shine.

name: Honey and Virgin Coconut Restorative Shampoo
description: Hydrating shampoo deeply moisturizes while gently cleansing with rich coconut foam. Restorative formula nourishes for stronger, healthier, glossier locks.

name: Burdock and Neem Healthy Scalp Shampoo
description: Purifying formula unclogs pores, stimulates circulation, and alleviates dryness, itching, and flaking. With added hydration for healthier scalp and hair.

name: Glossy Locks Repair Shampoo
description: Natural shampoo for restoring health and vitality to dry, damaged locks. Replenishes with essential vitamins and nutrients, while hydrating with rose and honey.

name: Glossy Locks Glossing Shampoo
description: Hydrating shampoo quenches hair while restoring bounce, shine, and luster. Gently washes away hair-dulling residues while nourishing and strengthening.

name: Glossy Locks Moisture Drench Shampoo
description: Luxuriously moisturizing shampoo deeply restores hydration and shine to thirsty locks. Fortified with nourishing aloe, biotin, rose water, and coconut oil.

name: Glossy Locks Grow More Shampoo
description: Minimizes shedding, stimulates hair growth, and deeply cleanses and clarifies scalp. Won't strip or dehydrate while promoting stronger, healthier hair.

name: Head To Toe Minis
description: The ultimate getaway goodie bag! Includes our best-selling Honey & Virgin Coconut hair care duo, Coconut Body Cream, and Coconut Shower Gel for serious head-to-toe moisture.

name: Coconut Shower Gel
description: Richly foaming shower gel lifts away dirt, oil, and impurities while rehydrating thirsty skin with coconut oil, soothing aloe, and mineral-rich red algae.

description: Richly foaming shower gel lifts away dirt, oil, and impurities while rehydrating thirsty skin with coconut oil, soothing aloe, and mineral-rich red algae.

name: Sweet Almond Gentle Shower Oil
description: Lightly foaming shower oil deeply cleanses while softening skin with nourishing vitamin E, apricot, and coconut oils.

name: Lavender Butter Soap
description: Triple milled vegetable soap made with shea butter, olive oil, and coconut oil to gently cleanse while deeply moisturizing for soft, supple skin.

name: Mango Butter Soap
description: Triple milled vegetable soap made with shea butter, olive oil, and coconut oil to gently cleanse while deeply moisturizing for soft, supple skin.

name: Intensive Nourishing Balm
description: Amazing for eczema, psoriasis + other skin disorders. An intensive moisture treatment for face and body. Concentrated with a blend of rich butters, nourishing oils, and calming lavender to soothe extra dry skin.

name: Skin Support Stretch Mark Butter
description: Richly moisturizing blend of shea and cocoa butter promotes healthy hydration and elasticity to support dry, stretched skin and beyond.

name: Vanilla Bean Nourishing Body Cream
description: Luxuriously creamy body lotion enriched with potent anti-aging vitamins, energizing green coffee, and brightening vitamin C for soft, youthfully supple skin.

name: Pink Grapefruit Nourishing Body Cream
description: Luxuriously creamy body lotion enriched with potent anti-aging vitamins, energizing green coffee, and brightening vitamin C for soft, youthfully supple skin.

name: Coconut Nourishing Body Cream
description: Luxuriously creamy coconut scented lotion enriched with potent anti-aging vitamins and antioxidants for softer, more supple skin. Deeply moisturizing cocoa and avocado soothe dryness and flaking, while aloe and rose hydrosol replenish essential hydration. Additions of stimulating Kona green coffee and vitamin C brighten and energize the skin for a more youthful glow. This silky smooth body cream is infused with the scent of sweet, tropical coconut.

name: French Lavender Nourishing Body Cream
description: Luxuriously creamy body lotion enriched with potent anti-aging vitamins, energizing green coffee, and brightening vitamin C for soft, youthfully supple skin.

name: Blood Orange Nourishing Body Cream
description: Luxuriously creamy body lotion enriched with potent anti-aging vitamins, energizing green coffee, and brightening vitamin C for soft, youthfully supple skin.

name: Vanilla Bean Whipped Body Butter
description: Thick and decadent body butter deeply moisturizes and softens using creamy cocoa, shea, and avocado butters, with added hydration from aloe and rose hydrosol.

name: Coconut Whipped Body Butter
description: Thick and decadent Coconut Whipped Body Butter deeply moisturizes and softens using creamy cocoa, shea, and avocado butters, with added hydration from aloe and rose hydrosol.

name: French Lavender Whipped Body Butter
description: Thick and decadent body butter deeply moisturizes and softens using creamy cocoa, shea, and avocado butters, with added hydration from aloe and rose hydrosol.

name: Mattifying Primer
description: Silicone-free primer infused with skin-plumping seaweed collagen for flawless, long lasting cosmetic application. Fills fine lines while minimizing shine.

name: Mattifying Primer Sample Packet
description: Skin healthy ingredients make this the perfect makeup primer for both face and eyes, to soften and smooth skin before you apply makeup.

name: Fruit Pigmented® Full Coverage Water Foundation
description: Fruit pigmented® foundation plumps and hydrates skin with soothing aloe and toning green tea. Offers flawless full coverage with a satin, lightly dewy finish.

name: Fruit Pigmented® Powder Foundation
description: Talc-free, fruit pigmented® pressed powder foundation absorbs oil and reduces shine with medium coverage, mattifying rice powder.

name: Bamboo Blur Powder
description: Translucent to tinted setting powders made with mattifying bamboo silica to absorb excess oil, stamp out shine, and refract light for a soft, poreless finish.

name: Fruit Pigmented® Healthy Foundation
description: Full coverage fruit pigmented® liquid foundation with soothing aloe, antioxidant-rich superfruit oils, oil-absorbing rice powder, and a flawless matte finish.

name: BB Cream
description: Hydrating BB Cream foundation offers a dewy, luminescent finish and buildable light-medium coverage. This natural BB cream is infused with skin soothing aloe, shea, and vitamin E.

name: Non Latex Makeup Blender
description: Odor-free, latex-free makeup sponge features a versatile design for delivering seamless blending, detailing, and application of liquid and cream formulas.

name: Fruit Pigmented® 2nd Skin Foundation
description: Ultralight serum foundation looks and feels like a second skin. Fruit pigmented® formula offers anti-aging benefits, medium-full coverage, and a satin finish.

name: Fruit Pigmented® Long Last Concealer with Super Fruits
description: Fruit pigmented® concealer is water, sweat, oil, and cake-resistant. Creamy, shea butter enriched formula provides opaque full coverage that lasts all day.

name: 2nd Skin Corrector
description: Ultra blendable color correctors made with hydrating olive squalane and natural pigments to banish redness, brighten your complexion, and correct dark circles.

name: Fruit Pigmented® 2nd Skin Concealer
description: Creamy, lightweight concealer colored from fruit and made with hydrating olive squalane. Blendable and buildable for medium-full coverage with a satin finish.

name: Fruit Pigmented® Blush
description: Versatile range of blush makeup made from finely pressed rice powder and antioxidant-rich fruit pigments to give cheeks a healthy, natural flush of color.

name: Fruit Pigmented® Gemmed Luminizer
description: Stunning powder highlighters colored by fruit pigments and laced with light-reflecting gemstones like opal, pyrite, and moonstone to illuminate your skin.

name: Fruit Pigmented® Lip & Cheek Tint
description: Designed for double duty as both a cream blush and lip tint. Made with vibrant fruit pigments, plus shea and cocoa butters for intense skin and lip-softening.

name: Fruit Pigmented® Cherry Lip & Cheek Stain
description: Multitasking semi-sheer stain gives a beautiful flush to lips and cheeks with long lasting, buildable pigments from beet, blueberry, and pomegranate.

name: Fruit Pigmented® Rose Gold Palette
description: This rose gold makeup palette is a treasure trove of warm metallics and stunning shimmer. Deluxe fruit pigmented® palette includes a highlighter, blush, and 3 eye shadows.

name: Fruit Pigmented® Better Naked Palette
description: Fruit Pigmented® makeup palette amplifies rosy, taupe, and beige toned nudes with shimmery, gilded metallics. Includes eyeshadows, blush, and highlighter.

name: Fruit Pigmented® Berry Naked Palette
description: Fruit Pigmented® berry eyeshadow palette of nude, blush, and metallic tones. Our vegan makeup palette includes eyeshadows, blush, and highlighter colored from fruit and vegetable pigments.

name: Fruit Pigmented® Pretty Naked Palette
description: Fruit pigmented® makeup palette celebrates neutral tones and soft shimmer to enhance and beautify your complexion. Includes eyeshadows, blush, and highlighter.
